TESTIMONIAL.NAME: Mario
TESTIMONIAL.COMMENT: Wake up, Luigi! The only time plumbers sleep on the job is when we're working by the hour.

TESTIMONIAL.NAME: Luigi
TESTIMONIAL.COMMENT: Look at all that loot! Diamonds, gold, rubies! It must be worth over 100 bucks!

TESTIMONIAL.NAME: Bowser
TESTIMONIAL.COMMENT: But... But I'm Bowser! I'm grade-A, 100% prime-cut final boss! I'm going to take over the world any day now! No way am I helping Mario! He's always trashing my awesome plans.

TESTIMONIAL.NAME: Mario
TESTIMONIAL.COMMENT: I wish Luigi were here, I could blame him!

TESTIMONIAL.NAME: Princess Zelda
TESTIMONIAL.COMMENT: Shadow and Light are two sides of the same coin...One cannot exist without the other.

TESTIMONIAL.NAME: Luigi
TESTIMONIAL.COMMENT: Mario, please! Don't say another word!

TESTIMONIAL.NAME: Mario
TESTIMONIAL.COMMENT: No woman can resist the charm of a Mario.
